divs: Sighting Details1st time there where 2 crafts this was on the 23rd of Dec 2011 at about 9:45 this was on gatlin blvd in port st lucie i was riding with a friend who seen the craft also. it was following a public airline plane and then another came down from space joined the other craft and then they both left very very fast and smooth with no noise at all. then i seen them again on Jan 1st 2012 this time i was in the back yard by a bonfire and my wife saw it first and also the same friend that saw the first set with me was there also this time it was about 1:15am we where watching them hover over our house for about 15 min and then began to travel north west into the atmosphere kinda wobbly and then solid and then took off real smooth until we could not see it and then about 20 mins later it came back and followed a similar path but then cut to the right and stayed in sight for about 10 min and then took off really really really fast and all this with no sound and the weirdest reddish orange glow.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fort Pierce
There were no other sightings in Fort Pierce on or around January 1st 2012
